$.holdingVolumeInLitres.help_text: The volume this box can hold. This is normally advertised on plastic containers.  For cardboard, calculate it with WxLxH/1000

$.volumeUtilisationQuotient.help_text: How efficient we can pack into this box from 0 to 1. A 0.5 quotient is inefficient, 0.65 is with lots of spaces, and 0.9 is well-packed.
